title: Fourteenth Biennial Conference - British Empire Service League
creator_credit: Returned Services League of Australia and University of Melbourne
brief_description: Documents the Fourteenth Biennial Conference of the British Empire Service League held at the Albert Hall in Canberra in 1958. Shows footage of the Queen Mother placing a wreath on the Canberra War Memorial and opening the Conference.
